name: Madison's Flower
description:
Madison's Flower

This game is the prequel of Time's Novel.

A Short Horror Visual Novel.

Madison has a crush on the rich popular guy from her school. She get's invited to his party and plans on confessing her feelings towards him there.

Liked the game?

You can buy me a coffee for 1$ on ko-fi.com or you can donate here any amount you want.

Just press the Download button and contribute a payment of however much you'd like.

Also, please DM me on Twitter @InteractiveSto3 if you find any bugs! I would really appreciate that!

TWF5YmUgc2hlIHdvdWxkIGhhdmUgY29uZmVzc2VkIGlmIG9ubHkgc2hlIGhhZG4ndCB0YWtlbiB0aGF0IERhdHVyYSBmbG93ZXIu

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

Credits:

  • Character sprites by NoranekoGames and StarAniseVN
  • Music: School day / Rain / Sun / Loop, Wub a dub dub dub, The Cynic Project
  • Rest of audio from opengameart.com
